attributes.action: convert sewage plants to produce power.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have an unending and guaranteed source of power which is being needlessly wasted. Our sewage. We expend energy and water on treating it when we could be using it to generate methane (with the right equipment) and in turn generate electricity!

For an initial outlay from the government to convert our sewage farms into power generation plants, we could save money, waste less water and cut down on other more controversial methods of electricity generation. Hence saving money in the long term!
